ygData.subject: Geforce and SBLive! questions for p3 800 system
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all! It has been ages since I posted anything.  I do lurk though :) I have a problem with system lock ups while playing EQ.  I have a new Gateway P3 800
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all!
It has been ages since I posted anything. I do lurk though :)

I have a problem with system lock ups while playing EQ. I have a new
Gateway P3 800 (coppermine), 256 ram, Geforce 256 DDR (by creative),
SBLive!, and a cable modem. I get a system lock up for no apparent reason.
I can be just waiting for a boat at the docks....LOCKS up. I have
downloaded the latest drivers and and reinstalled Direct X 7, and this fixed
a funny sound problem (the one where everything sounds ok only when
sitting). I do get flashes of lines or boxes on the screen. Even just
standing with no songs going. The game plays ok with these flashes (if you
call that ok). I have changed all the resolutions in the game control box,
I have turned on and off all the effects, and nothing seems to matter.

It is disappointing to upgrade to a rig that should run the bejeeezous out
of EQ, then have it do crashes and whatnot. OTH, the game loads FAST, and I
zone darn quick now too.

Please, someone say they have an idea of what I can do!!!!

Fflewduer Fflamson 48 Bard, Cazic-Thule server, Knights of Loyalty

P.S. Good to see more and more CT Bards about! :)
